docs.snippet: Upon my arrival in Montevideo I made a request through Minister Jeffery for a personal interview with President Brum. Minister Jeffery informed me that the time of our visit was so limited and the days so full of entertainment of the Colby mission by...
docs.lead_paragraph: Upon my arrival in Montevideo I made a request through Minister Jeffery for a personal interview with President Brum. Minister Jeffery informed me that the time of our visit was so limited and the days so full of entertainment of the Colby mission by the President and his Cabinet officers that he doubted the possibility of securing it.

headline.main: BRUM DISCUSSES HIS LEAGUE IDEA; President of Uruguay Explains Proposal as an Enlarged Monroe Doctrine. FOR PREFERENTIAL TARIFF Believes, He Says, South American Republics Should Favor One Another In Levying Duties.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Feb., 2.--The LatinAmerican Diplomatic Corps formally welcomed home today Secretary of State Bainbriedge Colby, who returned last week from a two months' visit to Brazil, Uruguay and Argentina.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Feb., 2.--The LatinAmerican Diplomatic Corps formally welcomed home today Secretary of State Bainbriedge Colby, who returned last week from a two months' visit to Brazil, Uruguay and Argentina.
docs.abstract: welcomes Sec Colby home from South Amer trip

headline.main: HONOR COLBY'S RETURN.; Latin-American Diplomats Formally Welcome Him Home.

docs.snippet: THE lucky ones who accompanied Secretary Bainbridge Colby on his  recent journey will not soon forget their first view of South America.
docs.lead_paragraph: THE lucky ones who accompanied Secretary Bainbridge Colby on his recent journey will not soon forget their first view of South America.
